#summary System configuration

= Standalone server =
pg_rman can run on standalone server.

It is recommended to put your database cluster ($PGDATA) and your backup catalog into different disk drives in case of disk crash.

[http://pg-rman.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/pg_rman-standalone-ja.png]

= With backup server =
Backup can be put on dedicated backup server. The database server mounts the backup server with NFS or so in order to read and write the disk as a file system. 

[http://pg-rman.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/pg_rman-remote-ja.png]
